sessions.title: Fuel Your Fixes: Visual Studio Debugging, Powered by Copilot
sessions.speaker: Harashada Hole, Cagri Aslan
sessions.summary:
Love Visual Studio Debugger? Get ready to love it even more. This session dives into how GitHub Copilot and AI are transforming the debugging experience—from setting smarter breakpoints to inspecting variables and stepping through code with intelligent suggestions. You’ll explore how AI enhances traditional workflows, helps you navigate complex issues, and introduces powerful new capabilities like agent mode, where Copilot acts as your debugging partner. Packed with live demos, this session isn’t just about catching bugs it’s about redefining what debugging feels like in an AI-powered IDE.

You will learn:

Use GitHub Copilot to simplify and accelerate every step of debugging.
Discover powerful, underused Visual Studio debugger features.
Experience Copilot’s new agent mode for interactive, AI-assisted debugging.

Visual Studio: http://visualstudio.com
VS Live on-demand sessions: https://aka.ms/vslivehq25
Missed the fun at MS HQ?! Join one of these upcoming events, we’ll see you there! VSLive events: https://aka.ms/VSS/VSLive
Subscriptions portal: https://my.visualstudio.com
